capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've been studying the characteristics of petunias and their unique features. Petunia lineage is actually a fascinating topic - it's known that they're part of the Solanaceae family. And when it comes to their appearance, petunias are often described as having maculogy, which refers to the presence of spots or blotches on their leaves.

You know, I was reading about petunias the other day and it's really interesting to learn about their lineage.
